title: sage line 50 2009 v1.5
description:
RELEASE SIZE: 1CD xx/44 @ 15Megs                      
               RELEASE DATE: 11/18/08                                 
               PROTECTION:   custom                                   
                                                                    
                     50 Accounts 2009 V15 (c) SAGE                 
                                                                    
             Does more than help you manage your day-to-day         
             finances, VAT returns and year-end accounts.           
                                                                    
             Sage 50 Accounts Professional 2009 does more than      
             help you manage your day-to-day tasks, like VAT        
             returns and year-end accounts. It's also packed        
             with features to help you collect money from           
             customers, ensuring that you get paid on time.         
                                                                    
             It gives you everything your business needs to work    
             with all areas of your accounts. You'll have complete  
             sales and purchase order processing, alongside stock   
             control, project management and foreign trading tools. 
                                                                    
             It also has the flexibility to handle up to 10 users   
             and manage multiple companies, giving you the          

             information to drive your business forward.            
                                                                    
             NOTE: Thanks to EMBRACE for another great keygen!      
  
                                                                    
              1) EXTRACT, BURN or MOUNT, INSTALL                    
              2) USE "MANAGER" WITHOUT PASSWORD TO LOGIN            
              3) SELECT TOOLS -> ACTIVATION                         
              3) USE KEYGEN IN ADDICTION DIR TO ACTIVATE            
              4) SPEND YOUR MONEY WISELY!  

                      please leave comments
